page.description: Class to hold GPS data for related ExifInfo class.

property.name: Version_Id
property.description:
Type: "C",
Version of GPS information (2.0.0.0 = 0200000.H)

property.name: Latitude_Ref
property.description:
Type: "C",
Indicates latitude being north or south (N or S)

property.name: Latitude
property.description:
Type: "C",
Latitude expressed in degrees minutes and seconds.

property.name: Longitude_Ref
property.description:
Type: "C",
Longitude reference, east or west (E or W)

property.name: Longitude
property.description:
Type: "C",
Longitude expressed in degrees minutes and seconds

property.name: Altitude_Ref
property.description:
Type: "C",
Altitude reference sea leve = 0, below sea level = 1l

property.name: Altitude
property.description:
Type: "C",
Altitude in meters.

property.name: Time_Stamp
property.description:
Type: "C",
Timestamp in UTC.

property.name: Satellites
property.description:
Type: "C",
Satallites used to calculate GPS.

property.name: Status
property.description:
Type: "C",
Status of GPS receiver

property.name: Measure_Mode
property.description:
Type: "C",
GPS measurement mode (2d or 3d)

property.name: Dop
property.description:
Type: "C",
Degrees of Precision.

property.name: Speed_Ref
property.description:
Type: "C",
Speed units (K,M,N for kilometers per hour, miles per hour, knots)

property.name: Speed
property.description:
Type: "C",
Speed that GPS receiver is moving.

property.name: Track_Ref
property.description:
Type: "C",
Method used to track direction of GPS receiver movement T for true, M for magnetic.

property.name: Track
property.description:
Type: "C",
Direction of movement of GPS receiver expressed as an angle (0-360 degrees)

property.name: Img_Direction_Ref
property.description:
Type: "C",
Direction image is taken (method true or magnetic)

property.name: Img_Direction
property.description:
Type: "C",
Direction image is taken expressed as an angle (0-360 degrees)

property.name: Map_Datum
property.description:
Type: "C",
Geodetic survey data.

property.name: Dest_Latitude_Ref
property.description:
Type: "C",
Indicates destination latitude being north or south (N or S)

property.name: Dest_Latitude
property.description:
Type: "C",
Latitude destination expressed in degrees minutes and seconds.

property.name: Dest_Longitude_Ref
property.description:
Type: "C",
Destination Longitude reference, east or west (E or W)

property.name: Dest_Longitude
property.description:
Type: "C",
Destination longitude expressed in degrees minutes and seconds

property.name: Dest_Bearing_Ref
property.description:
Type: "C",
Bearing to destintation point T for true, M for magnetic.

property.name: Dest_Bearing
property.description:
C
Bearing to destintation point (0-360 degrees)

property.name: Dest_Distance_Ref
property.description:
Type: "C",
Distance to destination units (K,M,N for kilometers, miles and knots)

property.name: Dest_Distance
property.description:
Type: "C",
Distance to the destination point.

property.name: Processing_Method
property.description:
Type: "C",
Method used for location finding.

property.name: Area_Information
property.description:
Type: "C",
Name of GPS area.

property.name: Date_Stamp
property.description:
Type: "C",
Timestamp of the GPS area.

property.name: Differential
property.description:
Type: "C",
Specifies if a differential correction was applied to the GPS receiver.
